channel.title: Highscores board?
channel.description: well i was thinking. my in-game highscores board is trash. and is very useless, so i wanted to make a Online highscores table in my website using Http Coding. but i need a little help. how do i make it connect to my game, and whats the code for it? i kind of want one like Frugooscape.net's one, it'd be great if you'd make me one, or tell me how. that way i can learn. thanks!

item.title: Highscores board?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:2, topic:201950”]In all honesty, I suggest you read up on HTTP and Java. If you don’t enjoy reading the Java tutorials and completing them (Or if you don’t feel happy due to a sense of accomplishment), then don’t think about doing complex things such as HiScore tables.

Your ingame one will have to do unless you’re willing to learn a heap of stuff. Alternatively, there’s the C+P option, which in my opinion, is absolutely worthless. You may get fun from using the code, but what will you get from pasting it into a file when it’s not even your work? Frustration, probably. This goes for all of you reading this post.

I can’t help you any other way, sorry. Good luck though.[/quote]

There’s always tuts. All the knowledge you need is to know where to put stuff and download a file :l

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores board?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

In all honesty, I suggest you read up on HTTP and Java. If you don’t enjoy reading the Java tutorials and completing them (Or if you don’t feel happy due to a sense of accomplishment), then don’t think about doing complex things such as HiScore tables.

Your ingame one will have to do unless you’re willing to learn a heap of stuff. Alternatively, there’s the C+P option, which in my opinion, is absolutely worthless. You may get fun from using the code, but what will you get from pasting it into a file when it’s not even your work? Frustration, probably. This goes for all of you reading this post.

I can’t help you any other way, sorry. Good luck though.

Read full topic
